sentences.en: A Boeing 737 came down on the M1 motorway.
sentences.cn: 一架波音737降落在1号高速公路上。
在高速公路上出的故障

sentences.en: A contraflow system is in operation on this section of the motorway.
sentences.cn: 这段高速公路的一侧正在实行双向行驶。
繁忙的 / 拥挤的高速公路

sentences.en: His back tyre just went pop on a motorway.
sentences.cn: 他的后胎在高速公路上砰的一声爆了。

sentences.en: Horrified commuters saw the lorry veer across the motorway and overturn.
sentences.cn: 惊恐万分的通勤者们看见那辆卡车突然冲向高速公路另一侧，接着翻倒在地。

sentences.en: I'm sure Ted is tootling down the motorway at this very moment.
sentences.cn: 我确信泰德此刻正悠闲自得地开车行驶在高速路上。

sentences.en: It's no joke when your brakes fail on the motorway.
sentences.cn: 在快车道上行驶时刹车失灵的后果是非常严重的.
在19号路口进入高速公路。

sentences.en: Several cars piled up after ignoring the fog warning on the motorway.
sentences.cn: 由于无视高速公路上的大雾警告，有好几辆汽车相撞。

sentences.en: the eastbound carriageway of the motorway
The French crowds pour like lemmings down the motorway to Paris.
sentences.cn: 一群群法国人像旅鼠一样涌上通往巴黎的高速公路。

sentences.en: the northbound carriageway of the motorway
the southbound carriageway of the motorway
sentences.cn: 高速公路的南向车行道

sentences.en: the westbound carriageway of the motorway
They are going to tender for the construction of a new motorway.
sentences.cn: 他们打算投标承建一条新的高速公路.

sentences.en: They arrived late due to a motorway hold-up.
sentences.cn: 他们因高速公路交通堵塞迟到了。

sentences.en: They were bowling along the motorway at sixty miles per hour.
sentences.cn: 他们以每小时60英里的速度在高速公路上飞驰。

words.tran_cn: 驾车旅行的人，开汽车的人
驾驶汽车；乘汽车经过（motor的过去式和过去分词）
[公路]高速公路，汽车高速公路

trans.tran_cn: 高速公路，汽车道，快车道
trans.tran_en: a very wide road for travelling fast over long distances, especially between cities
